M

Main - Class in arcoir
The Main class runs and executes the program.

Index of the MenuScreen.
MenuScreen - Class in screens
The MenuScreen class displays the initial screen when the user first runs the program.
MenuScreen(DrawingSurface) - Constructor for class screens.MenuScreen
Constructs a DrawingScreen object.
mouseDragged() - Method in class arcoir.DrawingSurface
Executes code on the active screen when the mouse is dragged.
mouseDragged(Point) - Method in class customization.DrawingScreen
Executes certain methods when the mouse is left dragged.
mouseDragged(Point) - Method in class screens.Screen
Executes code when the mouse is dragged.

Executes code on the active screen when the mouse is moved.
mouseMoved(Point) - Method in class screens.Screen

Executes code on the active screen when the mouse is pressed.
mousePressed(Point) - Method in class customization.ColorPalette
(Graphical UI) Changes the selected color to the color the mouse was clicked on.
mousePressed(Point) - Method in class customization.DrawingScreen
Executes certain methods when the mouse is left clicked.
mousePressed(double, double, DrawingSurface, int, boolean, boolean) - Method in class dashboard.Dashboard
Carries out mouse methods when the mouse is left clicked.
mousePressed(Point) - Method in class game.GameOverScreen
Executes methods when the mouse is left clicked.
mousePressed(Point) - Method in class game.GameScreen
if the left mouse button if pressed, the dashboard's mousePressed button is called
mousePressed(Point) - Method in class screens.MenuScreen
